mutants.code:
def get_pizza_order(arr, n):
    completion_times = []
    for i in range(n):
        (order_time, prep_time) = arr[i]
        completion_times.append((order_time - prep_time, i + 1))
    completion_times.sort()
    result = [index for (_, index) in completion_times]
    return result

def get_pizza_order(arr, n):
    completion_times = []
    for i in range(n):
        (order_time, prep_time) = arr[i]
        completion_times.append((order_time * prep_time, i + 1))
    completion_times.sort()
    result = [index for (_, index) in completion_times]
    return result

    completion_times = []
    for i in range(n):
        (order_time, prep_time) = arr[i]
        completion_times.append((order_time + prep_time, i - 1))
    completion_times.sort()
    result = [index for (_, index) in completion_times]
    return result

def get_pizza_order(arr, n):
    completion_times = []
    for i in range(n):
        (order_time, prep_time) = arr[i]
        completion_times.append((order_time + prep_time, i + -1))
    completion_times.sort()

    return result
